properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 12 at 4:20AM CST until February 13 at 4:18PM CST by NWS Nashville TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a Flood Advisory for the
following rivers in Middle Tennessee...

Cumberland River At Pennington Bend affecting Davidson County
Cumberland River Near Bordeaux affecting Davidson County
Cumberland River At Dover affecting Stewart County

. Water levels remain elevated all along the Cumberland River due to recent heavy
rains and water releases.

The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
The Cumberland River At Dover.
* At 03AM Wednesday the stage was 62.0 feet...and slowly climbing.
* Action stage is 62.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 66.0 feet.
* The river will rise to near 64.1 feet Friday evening.
* At 66.0 feet...Flooding along the river begins in Stewart County, impacting
agricultural areas, the adjacent tributaries, and roads near the river, many
of which become impassable. Near Dover, water affects portions of River Rd
west of Hwy 79, Bellwood Branch Rd, Cross Creek Rd, and approaches Eagles Nest
Dr near Short Creek Rd. Near Cumberland City and Indian Mound, water impacts
areas on Atkinson Dr, TN-149, Lee Hollow Rd, Wildcat Creek Rd east of Highway
46, and the ferry access points on Highway 46.
* At 64.0 feet...Low lying areas along the river and the adjacent tributaries
continue to be inundated, including agricultural areas, roads near the river,
and access points. Locations impacted near Dover inculde River Rd between Tom
Earhart Rd and the Blue Creek Recreation Area boat ramp, Bellwood Branch Rd
near Patricia Cir, Cub Creek Cove, and the Commissary Hollow access point.
Near Indian Mound, water is covering Lee Hollow Rd at Dunaway Hollow, and near
Cumberland City, Wildcat Creek Rd at Wildcat Creek.
* At 62.0 feet...Low lying agricultural areas along the river, adjacent
tributaries, and river access points are inundated, including River Rd between
Tom Earhart Rd and the Blue Creek Recreation Area boat ramp, Bellwood Branch
Rd near Patricia Cir, Cub Creek Cove and the Commissay Hollow Accesss point,
wildcat Creek Rd at Wildcat Creek, and Lee Hollow Rd at Dunaway Hollow.
properties.instruction:
Stay tuned to NOAA weather radio or other local media for further information
from the National Weather Service.
